A function to add sequence to an existing GRanges

Source: R/GRanges.R
withSeq.Rd

This function is 'tidyverse-friendly', i.e. it adds a .$seq columns to a GRanges of interest, according the provided BSgenome or DNAStringSet object.

withSeq(granges, genome)

Arguments

granges

A GRanges object
genome

UCSC ID, BSgenome of DNAStringSet object.

Value

GRanges with a seq column containing the sequence of the GRanges.

Examples

data(ce11_all_REs)
ce11_all_REs
#> GRanges object with 47514 ranges and 2 metadata columns:
#>                                    seqnames            ranges strand |
#>                                       <Rle>         <IRanges>  <Rle> |
#>                     ._chrI_328_478     chrI           328-478      * |
#>                    ._chrI_864_1014     chrI          864-1014      * |
#>                   ._chrI_1901_2051     chrI         1901-2051      * |
#>            Y74C9A.6_chrI_3827_3977     chrI         3827-3977      * |
#>              homt-1_chrI_4277_4427     chrI         4277-4427      * |
#>                                ...      ...               ...    ... .
#>           ._chrX_17702756_17702906     chrX 17702756-17702906      * |
#>    H11L12.1_chrX_17711839_17711989     chrX 17711839-17711989      - |
#>      6R55.2_chrX_17714483_17714633     chrX 17714483-17714633      * |
#>   cTel55X.1_chrX_17714955_17715105     chrX 17714955-17715105      * |
#>   cTel55X.1_chrX_17718452_17718602     chrX 17718452-17718602      * |
#>                                       regulatory_class           which.tissues
#>                                               <factor>                <factor>
#>                     ._chrI_328_478   other_element     Germline               
#>                    ._chrI_864_1014   other_element     Germline               
#>                   ._chrI_1901_2051   putative_enhancer Germline               
#>            Y74C9A.6_chrI_3827_3977   non-coding_RNA    Germline_Muscle_Intest.
#>              homt-1_chrI_4277_4427   putative_enhancer Unclassified           
#>                                ...                 ...                     ...
#>           ._chrX_17702756_17702906 unassigned_promoter            Unclassified
#>    H11L12.1_chrX_17711839_17711989 rev-promoter                   Germline    
#>      6R55.2_chrX_17714483_17714633 putative_enhancer              Ubiq.-Biased
#>   cTel55X.1_chrX_17714955_17715105 putative_enhancer              Unclassified
#>   cTel55X.1_chrX_17718452_17718602 other_element                  Germline    
#>   -------
#>   seqinfo: 6 sequences from an unspecified genome; no seqlengths
ce11_all_REs <- withSeq(ce11_all_REs, 'ce11')
ce11_all_REs
